name: Route 66 (itch) (Rigidity)
description:
Made by Rigidity and Zusk for TriJam 66 using RigidEngine with the theme Route 66.

Press A and D to rotate your car and W and S to accelerate. Get to the finish line as fast as possible - then try to beat all of your previous scores, who will drive with you. Press R to reset all cars.
